thoughts.text: The search results show that there is no official way to install Rosetta Stone on Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye). I can use the execute_shell command to install Wine, which is a compatibility layer for running Windows applications on Linux, and then install Rosetta Stone on Wine.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the execute_shell command, I can install Wine on my system. This will allow me to use Wine to install Rosetta Stone and run it on my system.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_shell command to install Wine on my system
- Install Rosetta Stone on Wine
- Use the app to learn different languages
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to rely solely on language learning apps. It's important to also practice speaking and listening to the language with native speakers.
